Ready to plan your event? Request a proposal now LAS VEGAS Las Vegas The Las Vegas Dining Room offers breathtaking aesthetics, an award-winning menu, and a causual atmosphere making it the perfect private space for intimate weddings, rehearsal dinners and social events, corporate, media or product launch events. The Private Dining Room can accommodate up to 64 guests, or be divided with an imperceptible retractable wall to retain intimacy for smaller gatherings of up to 24 or 40 guests in our east and west room‚Äôs respectively. Up to 64 guests 3 Rooms REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL see group menu lincoln road Planning a celebration or a special event? At Havana 1957 Lincoln Road, we bring the authentic flavors of Cuba to your table with our expertly curated group menus. Designed for parties of all sizes, our menus offer a selection of traditional Cuban dishes that will delight your guests. From the rich aroma of our slow-cooked Ropa Vieja to the vibrant zest of our Mojitos, each dish reflects the passion and heritage of Cuban cuisine. Whether it‚Äôs a corporate event, family gathering, or festive celebration, our dedicated team ensures a memorable dining experience in the heart of Miami Beach. REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL see group menu ocean drive (940) Host your next event at Havana 1957, located in the iconic Breakwater Hotel, where the charm of Old Havana meets the vibrant energy of Miami Beach. Our group menus are thoughtfully designed to bring authentic Cuban flavors to your celebrations, offering a diverse selection of dishes that reflect Cuba‚Äôs rich culinary heritage. Whether you‚Äôre planning an intimate gathering, a corporate event, or a large celebration, our group menus feature crowd-pleasing favorites like Lech√≥n Asado, Pollo a la Plancha, and our signature cocktails, including the irresistible Mojito Cubano. Paired with our warm hospitality and lively atmosphere, your event will be unforgettable. Our group menus are designed to make every celebration special, offering a variety of authentic dishes that cater to all tastes. Savor Cuban classics like Lech√≥n Asado, Vaca Frita, and our signature Havana 1957 Chicken, paired with refreshing Mojitos or handpicked wines. Plan your event with us today and let Havana 1957 Pembroke Pines create a memorable Cuban-inspired celebration for you and your guests. of old Cuba to Lincoln... Miami Beach Community News Miami Beach Featured The new Havana 1957 brings the glamour of old Cuba to Lincoln Road By Community Newspapers - May 11, 2013 Facebook Twitter Pinterest WhatsApp Commissioner Exposito cutting the ceremonial ribbon. V&E Restaurant group is pleased to announce the opening of Havana 1957- a new restaurant in the heart of South Beach, which combines the flavors of traditional Cuban cuisine with the enchantment and sophistication of Havana in the 1950‚Äôs. On Friday, April 26th, Commissioner Exposito, joined by locals and Miami Beach Chamber of Commerce members, participated in the ribbon cutting ceremony welcoming the restaurant to Lincoln Road. With elegant art deco touches, the interior d√©cor of Havana 1957 embodies the jet set lifestyle of the movie stars that made Havana their playground. One of the most outstanding features of the restaurant is the classic Cuban Rum bar, which stocks over 100 varieties of rum from around the world. Here guests can enjoy a Cuba Libre or a Mojito cocktail in a sophisticated ambiance, surrounded by vintage Cuban memorabilia without leaving Miami Beach. Havana 1957‚Äôs extensive menu contains authentic Cuban dishes prepared by renowned chef Juan Luis Rosales. By only using the freshest ingredients and perfecting each detail of presentation, the plates capture the vibrant taste that has made Cuban cuisine a culinary staple. Serving breakfast, lunch and dinner, highlights from the menu include the Havana 1957 Specialty (family traditional roasted chicken in a savory Cuban gravy served with white rice, black beans, salad and sweet plantains) as well as Churrasco a la Cubana (juicy charbroiled flank steak topped with grilled onions). Havana 1957 also offers delicious daily specials and a wide selection of seafood plates, sandwiches, salads, soups and bites such as croquetas, masitas de puerco (fried pork) and tostones rellenos (stuffed green plantains with beef or shrimp). Irresistible desserts include the traditional Flan de Leche (baked custard with a layer of caramelized sugar) and Pudin de Pan (old fashioned bread pudding) that are guaranteed to make mouths water with delight. Havana 1957 would not be complete without serving the staple Cuban Coffee, which is brewed exclusively with Caf√© Pilon. The ribbon cutting was a success. The highly anticipated Havana 1957 has arrived on Lincoln Road as a glamorous throwback to the days of the iconic Rat Pack. The restaurant is open daily from 9:00 AM to 1:00 AM and has complimentary wi-fi available for all guests. For more information please call 305.397.8683 or visit www.havana1957.com . ABOUT VE RESTAURANT GROUP Vida & Estilo (Spanish for ‚ÄòLife & Style‚Äô) is the restaurant group behind some of the most well-known and finest restaurants on Espanola Way located in the heart of South Beach and the downtown Miami/ Brickell area. V&E Restaurant group owns and operates OH! Mexico, Caf√© Nuvo, La Cantina, Mojitos Lounge, Segafredo Brickell and Spazio Nero (the club at Segafredo). The Segafredo franchise has also expanded to Bal Harbour Shops and the historical Espanola Way in Miami Beach. V&E is a corporation that stands by the meaning of their name and goes above and beyond to provide their guests an unforgettable luxury experience by incorporating and combining high-end cuisines, diverse selections of specialty cocktails, music from renowned DJ‚Äôs and chic yet comfortable atmospheres. V&E Restaurant Group consists of a team of international and experienced professionals with the drive, ambition and power to take a concept, build on it and successfully incorporate the caf√©, epicurean and nightlife concepts into one. Winner for Best Cuban in the New Times Best of Miami Reader‚Äôs Poll 2024 for 2nd consecutive year TESTIMONIALS & REVIEWS We love to hear from our guests. Our authentic Cuban restaurant on Lincoln Road in Miami offers a taste of Havana in the 1950s. But don‚Äôt take our word for it ‚Äì read our testimonials below. OH MY!!! Talk about the best service ever at a Restaurant! Freddy, the waiter over at Havana 1957 on Lincoln Street in Miami Beach, FL was AMAZING!!!! Once seated, Freddy took my husband and I drink order, followed by dinner order. The drinks came immediately and the food followed. His drink, food, and desert recommendations were ON POINT! For a minute, we actually thought we were in Havana. Candace Hudson-Jackson Google For my first Cuban Food experience, I most certainly chose the best restaurant! We ordered some local favorites like the sangria and the chicken, and everything had so much good flavor. The plantains were equally as good, along with the hospitality from the server, this is definitely where I'd suggest anyone go for some authentic Cuban food! Charles C. Las Vegas, NV,¬†Yelp Before coming to Miami, I was told by my friends that I could find a lot of good Cuban restaurants here. And now I believed that they were not joking when they said that lol. If Yelp allows half point, I'd give this place 4.5. And I'll explain why.¬† My boyfriend had the skirt stake. To us, this dish was a little subpar. The stake really lacked seasoning, and was a little chewy. Charles C.
